/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the driver's seat of a car, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant life. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
